name: taunt
description: Hurl Monty Python insults at the world

untargeted: I don't want to talk to you no more, you empty-headed animal food trough water!
I fart in your general direction! Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!
Go and boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person!
I wave my private parts at your aunties, you cheesy lot of second-hand electric donkey-bottom biters!
Go away or I shall taunt you again!
untargetedRoom: {actor} hurls insults at everyone: "I don't want to talk to you no more, you empty-headed animal food trough water!"
{actor} taunts: "I fart in your general direction! Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!"
{actor} shouts: "Go and boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person!"
{actor} waves rudely: "I wave my private parts at your aunties, you cheesy lot of second-hand electric donkey-bottom biters!"
{actor} warns: "Go away or I shall taunt you again!"
